item.title: Thank you, Mr. Trump
item.description: Thanks to the United States of America and the current economic dealings with the West, I think we have all had a sudden awakening to the criticality of sovereignty in trade, technology, and intellectual property, especially driven by tariffs. While this is not a brand-new concern, the Indian government has been communicating its importance for years. The difference now is urgency. Although we have some head start and momentum, we are still far from prepared for what lies ahead.
